text: Speaking to The Guardian, Buchan said his old co-star would make an excellent Doctor Who. "It's a sublime bit of casting. He's got that huge hair, a twinkle in his eye - Matt's the king of geek chic. He is possibly going to be one of the best Doctors we 've ever had. ''
title: Smith, 26, who played a young political researcher in the show, will become the biggest star of all after winning the role of the 11th Doctor.
